entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is stuck back in Umbridge's office with giant flying bogeys attacking him.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge's office is where Malfoy is stuck.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville was part of the D.A. and wants to help Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is trying to rescue Sirius and thinks Neville, Luna, and Ginny are not the best choices for the task.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is thinking about who Harry would choose to join him in rescuing Sirius.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the people Harry and Ron would choose to join them.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is someone Harry wouldn't choose to join him in rescuing Sirius.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna wants to help Harry and thinks they should come too.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is the person Harry and Ron are trying to rescue.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is the main enemy of the D.A. and the wizarding world.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to rescue Sirius.
Luna also wants to help Harry.
Ron is thinking along with Harry about who to choose for the task.
